code: import Close from"./close";import{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Showcase(_ref){let{offer,close}=_ref;if(offer==null){return;}const[newReview,setNewReview]=useState("");const[reviews,setReviews]=useState(offer?offer.reviews||[]:[]);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const response=await fetch('/api/addReview',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({offer_id:offer.id,review:newReview})});if(response.ok){setReviews([...reviews,newReview]);setNewReview("");}else{alert("Failed to add review");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"showcaseBackground",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Close,{func:close}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"showcase",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"imgContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"background",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(offer.image,")")}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"main",src:offer.image})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:offer.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:offer.seller}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:offer.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"reviews",style:{maxHeight:'200px',overflowY:'scroll',border:'1px solid #ccc',padding:'10px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Reviews"}),offer.reviews&&offer.reviews.length>0?offer.reviews.map((review,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"review",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:review})},index)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No reviews yet."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:newReview,onChange:e=>setNewReview(e.target.value),placeholder:"Add your review here",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit Review"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{children:["BUY: ",offer.price,"\u20AC"]})]})]})]});}export default Showcase;
